languages.text: "О, Ирлиэт, не дай Азуриан предстать тебе хоть единожды перед судом провидцев. Ибо наши собратья нетерпимы к подобной мерзости, что заставляет наши души тускнеть — и ты это знаешь".
"Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."
languages.original_text: "О, Ирлиэт, не дай Азуриан предстать тебе хоть единожды перед судом провидцев. Ибо наши собратья нетерпимы к подобной мерзости, что заставляет наши души тускнеть — и ты это знаешь".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade, and you know this yourself."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade, and you know this yourself."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Oh, Yrliet, que Asuryan te guarde de afrontar el juicio de los videntes. Pues los nuestros no se muestran tolerantes con las aberraciones que diluyen nuestras almas; tú lo sabes bien».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, Yrliet, que Asuryan te guarde de afrontar el juicio de los videntes. Pues los nuestros no se muestran tolerantes con las aberraciones que diluyen nuestras almas; tú lo sabes bien».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「おお、ユリエット。アシュリアンが君を先見司たちの裁きからお守りくださいますように。我々の血族は、魂を衰えさせる異形の存在に寛容ではないからな…君も知っているだろう」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."

traits.locale_text: 「おお、ユリエット。アシュリアンが君を先見司たちの裁きからお守りくださいますように。我々の血族は、魂を衰えさせる異形の存在に寛容ではないからな…君も知っているだろう」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “哦，伊莉耶特，愿阿苏焉保护你永远不会受到先知的审判。如你所知，我们的族人无法容忍这样的反常关系，这会让我们的灵魂凋零。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."

traits.locale_text: “哦，伊莉耶特，愿阿苏焉保护你永远不会受到先知的审判。如你所知，我们的族人无法容忍这样的反常关系，这会让我们的灵魂凋零。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Oh, Yrliet, puisse Asuryan vous épargner d'affronter un jour le jugement des Grands Prophètes ! Car nous ne saurions tolérer de telles aberrations, qui vouent notre âme à l'extinction. Vous le savez. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, Yrliet, puisse Asuryan vous épargner d'affronter un jour le jugement des Grands Prophètes ! Car nous ne saurions tolérer de telles aberrations, qui vouent notre âme à l'extinction. Vous le savez. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Oh, Yrliet, möge Asuryan es Euch ersparen, jemals dem Urteil der Runenpropheten ausgesetzt zu sein. Denn gegenüber solchen Entgleisungen ist unsere Art sehr intolerant, da sie unsere Seelen zum Verblassen bringen – Ihr wisst das."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Yrliet, möge Asuryan es Euch ersparen, jemals dem Urteil der Runenpropheten ausgesetzt zu sein. Denn gegenüber solchen Entgleisungen ist unsere Art sehr intolerant, da sie unsere Seelen zum Verblassen bringen – Ihr wisst das."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Yrliet, Asuryan seni Ötesezenlerin yargılamasına maruz kalmaktan korusun. Zira soydaşlarımız, ruhlarımızı güçten düşüren böylesi sapkılara müsamaha göstermez. Biliyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Yrliet, may Asuryan spare you from ever facing the Farseers' judgement. For our kin are intolerant of such aberrations that make our souls fade — you know this."

traits.locale_text: "Ah Yrliet, Asuryan seni Ötesezenlerin yargılamasına maruz kalmaktan korusun. Çünkü soydaşlarımız, ruhlarımızı güçten düşüren böylesi sapkınlıklara müsamaha göstermezler. Bunu sen de biliyorsun."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
